card.name: Pyre
card.text: Once ignited, +1 ember per turn. Player can play one additional ignition or combustible.

card.name: Ignite
card.text: Cost 1 ember. Ignite 1 combustible. Player can play one additional ignition or combustible.

card.name: Bonfire
card.text: Combine 3 ingited pyres into 1 bonfire for +3 ember per turn. Player can play one additional ignition or combustible.

card.name: Inferno
card.text: Cost 5 ember. Deals 2 damage multiplied by the number of Infernos previously used this turn. Draw 3 cards. Can ignite 1 combustible. Player can play one additional Inferno.

card.name: Lamentation of the Firebird
card.text: Cost 50 ember. Deals 25 damage. Can ignite 1 combustible.

card.name: Fire at Will!
card.text: Sacrifice any number of ignited Structures. Deals 3 damage per sacrificed Structure.

card.name: Scorch
card.text: Cost 2 ember. Deals 5 damage every turn to any card in your opponent's field. +1 ember per turn.

card.name: Hellfire Comet
card.text: In 3 turns, choose one spell to double the ember cost and damage dealt.

card.name: Gale Winds
card.text: For 2 turns, ember costs and structure health are doubled.

card.name: Scorched Earth
card.text: On next turn, all ignited combustibles in your field produce 2x ember. Then, half of combustibles must be removed.

card.name: Summon Fire Demon
card.text: Cost 5 ember. Deals 5 damage to opponent target. Can be used to ignite 1 combustible. Can follow with additional lower-ember spell.

card.name: Fire Arrows
card.text: Cost 10 ember. Deal 2 damage to all items in opponent's field. Can be used to ignite 1 combustible. Can follow with additional lower-ember spell.

card.name: Awaken the Balrog
card.text: Cost 30 ember. Deal 15 damage divided in any way. Can be used to ignite 1 combustible.
